1. A Deep Dive Into BioWare's Companion Design Philosophy In Dragon Age: The Veilguard  Game Informer

  4. Dragon Age: The Veilguard Has the Most Complex, Fully Realized Companions We’ve Ever Crafted, Says BioWare  Wccftech
  5. Dragon Age: The Veilguard Is Gonna Show A Lot Of Skin  GameSpot

item.title: Post-Apocalyptic Shooter Blowing Up Steam Has A Wild First Week - Kotaku
item.description:
